aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Chat with AI assistant to get help and advice
aiAssistant.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm the AI assistant. How can I help you?
aiAssistant.errorMessage: Sorry, the service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

eventAnalysisPrompt.expertRole: You are a senior network security analysis expert. Please provide professional analysis of the following intrusion/event alert data in English:
eventAnalysisPrompt.basicElements: 1. Basic Elements: timestamp, source/destination IP and ports, protocols (proto/app_proto), signature (signature/signature_id), severity level.
eventAnalysisPrompt.signatureAnalysis: 2. Signature and Category Analysis: attack/behavior meaning, common triggers.
eventAnalysisPrompt.threatAssessment: 3. Threat Assessment: risk level and potential impact based on severity and signature.
eventAnalysisPrompt.attribution: 4. Attribution and Impact Scope: possible attack stages, internal/external behavior, lateral movement indicators.
eventAnalysisPrompt.falsePositive: 5. False Positive Possibility: field combinations that may cause false positives, points requiring manual verification.
eventAnalysisPrompt.recommendations: 6. Recommended Response Steps: immediate actions, further investigation, hardening/protection recommendations.
eventAnalysisPrompt.commands: 7. If necessary, provide brief executable investigation command examples (no destructive commands).
eventAnalysisPrompt.guidance: Please avoid repeating raw field content, focus on interpretation and reasoning.

protocolAnalysisPrompt.analysisRequest: Please analyze the following {protocol} protocol network traffic data and provide detailed explanations:
protocolAnalysisPrompt.analysisAspects: Please analyze from the following aspects:
protocolAnalysisPrompt.basicInfo: 1. Basic packet information interpretation (source IP, destination IP, ports, etc.)
protocolAnalysisPrompt.protocolFields: 2. Protocol-specific field meanings and functions (detailed explanation with field documentation)
protocolAnalysisPrompt.securityRisks: 3. Possible security risks or anomaly identification
protocolAnalysisPrompt.geolocation: 5. Geographic location and ISP information analysis
protocolAnalysisPrompt.recommendations: 6. Recommended follow-up actions or optimization suggestions
protocolAnalysisPrompt.guidance: Please answer in English and maintain professionalism and accuracy. When explaining fields, please refer to the field documentation provided above. If any anomalies or suspicious patterns are found, please highlight them specifically.

aging.title: Aging Management

manual.title: Manual Delete
manual.description: Immediately delete all data associated with the target session ID. This action cannot be undone.
manual.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all data for session ID '{{sessionId}}'? This action will permanently delete all associated data and cannot be undone.
manual.beforeTimeHint: Only delete records with timestamp earlier than the selected time.
manual.confirmMessageMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete all data for collectors {{collectors}} before {{time}}? This action cannot be undone.

schedule.title: Automatic Delete Schedule
schedule.retentionDaysHelp: Data older than this many days will be automatically deleted
